Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Fixed
        • Button
  • public class Button
extends Fixed
    This is a superclass for all UI Buttons.

    The class is responsible for setting a button's state and applying it's function

    Version:
    1.0 (22/12/2020)
    Author:
    Ro»ôca Paul-Teodor
